definition: to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: He hesitated and added, the muscles of his face contracting whitely.
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的肌肉在皱缩发白，一面吞吞吐吐地接下去说。

sentences.english: The sky started to grow lighter and the shadow in the little town less dark.
sentences.chinese: 天色渐渐发白，小镇里的阴影处也慢慢亮了起来。

sentences.english: This is still in three thousand 24 bridge, hair cream white, old people still forget to.
sentences.chinese: 二十四桥今仍在，三千青丝霜发白，旧人犹忘来。

sentences.english: Black hair is a sharp contrast to the white skin.
sentences.chinese: 黑发白肤形成鲜明的对照。

sentences.english: His angry, red face became white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 他那张本来气得发红的脸由于害怕而变得发白。

sentences.english: Leave for 5 minutes until surface looks whitish.
sentences.chinese: 等待5分钟直到表面开起来发白。

sentences.english: White-faced, They both ran from the room into the passage.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩脸色发白，一起从屋里来到了通道。

sentences.english: American grebe having a black-banded whitish bill.
sentences.chinese: 发白的嘴上有黑色斑纹的美洲。

sentences.english: If you have pain and numbness or if the color of the fingers turns pale or dark, come right away.
sentences.chinese: 如果手指疼和发麻或颜色发白或发暗，就马上来诊治。

sentences.english: Becky's face paled, but she thought she could.
sentences.chinese: 42贝基的脸色发白，可她觉得她能受得了。

sentences.english: It gives way to the whitish stratosphere and then into the mesosphere.
sentences.chinese: 在它之外是发白的平流层，然后是进入散逸层。

sentences.english: Edgar sprang to his unbidden guest, blanched with astonishment and rage.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加冲向这位不速之客，脸色因惊愕与愤怒而发白。

sentences.english: In a healthy woman, such discharges are whitish in color.
sentences.chinese: 在一个健康的女人中，如此的解除是发白的在颜色中。

sentences.english: Both hands, smoke white, covered his face.
sentences.chinese: 老人用烟雾般发白的，两只手遮着脸。

sentences.english: They pierce even the full moon in the sky, making it pale and ill at ease.
sentences.chinese: 直刺着天空中圆满的月亮，使月亮窘得发白。

sentences.english: Open widely rich think to want to go, until beyond the horizon deliver white, didn't also fall comatose.
sentences.chinese: 张大富思来想去，直到天边发白，也没有睡着。

definition: to be suffused with white/to be discolored/to blanch
Qingbaijiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
to weaken/to go soft (at the knees)
to change color/to discolor/to change countenance/to become angry
